msg: Wording changes to the "What is Velocity?" section.

msg: * src/java/org/apache/velocity/test/VelocityServletTest.java

"VelocityTestContext" to implement Servlet API 2.3 method.

author: dlr
msg: Latest docs.

author: dlr
msg: * xdocs/vtl-reference-guide.xml
Corrected "Variable reference" example as pointed out by NIIHO
Hiroshi.
Issue: http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=25261

author: dlr
msg: * src/java/org/apache/velocity/util/introspection/Info.java
It strikes me that longs would be more appropriate than ints for
scaling to large file sizes.  More importantly, this logic could be
used by the parser.  Not addressing either yet.
Info(String, int, int): Added JavaDoc and used more meaningful
parameter names.
Info(): Added JavaDoc.
toString(): New method which formats a textual representation of
this object as "SOURCE [line X, column Y]", like most of the logging
and exception handling in the parser.
* src/java/org/apache/velocity/util/introspection/UberspectImpl.java
getIterator(Object, Info): Added JavaDoc and reduced the verbosity
of the logging associated with use of Iterator and Enumeration from
WARN to DEBUG.  I'd be okay with INFO, but WARN is too loud for the
entirely reasonable use of an Iterator by the view layer.  Improved
log messages as well.
A touch of misc. code stylistic changes further down.
Issue: PCN23600
